name: Oiran
description:
Trained on 70 photoreal Oiran (High-ranking Courtesan) women using anime tags.

Most of them are sitting but they can stand and quite successfully since I made sure to add some in the source. Sometimes they may melt into the floor though.

  • Weight: 0.7 or less (Anything more than 0.85 is muddled, mostly)

  • Works better with anime models or a blend.

  • Preview images using BanoffePie-Kenshi7thMix are from my Sweet-Factory model.

  • In the negative prompts you may have to put in (realistic, 3d) and add a higher weight to it; Otherwise it might create uncanny realistic subjects.

Prompts

Negative Prompts:

3D

Realistic

Watermark

White background

Headdress/Headwear

Tattoo

Sitting/yokozuwari/seiza

2girls

Cleavage

Web address (not really necessary but just in case)
